title: Quarkdown Tokens Schema
description: Schema for layout of token identifiers in Quarkdownâ€™s parsing engine JSON.

tokens.title: Line-Wise Tokens
tokens.description: Tokens processed across an entire line.

shard.description: A unique identifier for the token and context.

opens-ctx.description: The context activated by the token.

regex-open.description: The regular expression that activates the context when matched.

required-ctx.description: The context(s) that must be active.

required-idx.description: The index of a line the token must appear at.

ctx-persists.description: Whether the context remains active between line breaks.

ctx-clashes.description: The context will not activate if these contexts are active. If set to a boolean, this specifies whether the context clashes with itself.

inhibits-quarkdown.description: Whether to prevent other contexts from activating while this context is active.

html-open.description:
The HTML tag to prepend to the text.

If set to `#AUTO`, a `div` will be added with `class` set to the token's shard.

html-replaces.description: The text pattern to replace with the opening HTML tag.

flags.description: Flags to trigger from the context's activation.

regex-close.description:
The regular expression that deactivates the context when matched.

If set to `#AUTO`, the context will close itself upon matching the same token.

html-close.description: The HTML tag to append to the text. If set to `#AUTO`, a `` is added.

ctx-collapses.description: How many layers to collapse the context stack by when this context is deactivated.

defaultSnippets.label: defaults
defaultSnippets.description: All default configurations for a token.
